title: Introduction to AI: Build and Deploy Your Own AI Model
description: In this session, you will build a beginner-friendly AI model from scratch, learn how to train it, and deploy it for real-world use.
courseOverview: In this hands-on course, you'll embark on a practical journey to create, train, and deploy an AI model, designed specifically for beginners. You'll start by understanding the fundamentals of AI and machine learning, exploring key concepts such as data preprocessing, model selection, and training techniques. Finally, you will deploy the model and create an UI to use your model.
willLearn: Understand AI fundamentals and machine learning basics
Build an AI model from scratch using beginner-friendly tools
Learn the process of training models
Explore techniques for deploying AI models for practical use
Gain hands-on experience with popular AI frameworks and platforms
prerequisites: Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure) is a plus
Interest in learning machine learning concepts and applications
technologies: Cloud services (AWS Lambda or Google Cloud Functions)

sections.title: Get Started
sections.firstMessage:
Welcome to Introduction to AI: Build and Deploy Your Own AI Model.

Are you ready to kick off your journey into the world of AI development?

The lessons for this section are:
1. Introduction to AI & Machine Learning.
2. Set Up the Environment.
